```js
build:
  image: node:lts
  stage: build
  script:
    - npm ci
    - npm run build
  artifacts:
    expire_in: 1 week
    paths:
      - dist
```

```js
# rest of .gitlab-ci.yml
test:
  image: node:lts
  stage: test
  script:
    - npm ci
    - npm run test:unit
```

```js
    lint:
      image: node:lts
      stage: test
      script:
        - npm ci
        - npm run lint
    ```

```js
    git add .
    git commit -m "add linting"
    git push
    ```

```js
    build:
      # other properties
      cache:
        key: $CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG
        paths:
          - dist
      # other properties
    # other jobs
    ```

```js
    # other jobs
    deploy:
      image: python:latest
      stage: deploy
      cache:
        key: $CI_COMMIT_REF_SLUG
        paths:
          - dist
      before_script:
        - pip install awscli
      script:
        - aws s3 sync ./dist s3://vue-workshop --acl=public-read
    ```
